mdRecord.dcterms:title: Euures en rime de Ian Antoine de Baif, Secretaire de la Chambre du Roy
Euvres en rime de Ian Antoine de Baif
Oeuvres en rime de Ian Antoine de Baif
Baïf, Jean-Antoine de, 1532-1589. Works. 1572
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Baïf, Jean-Antoine de, 1532-1589
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Pour Lucas Breyer, marchant libraire tenant sa boutique au second pilier de la grand' salle du Palais
mdRecord.dcterms:description: General title in vol. 1 only. Other 3 vols. have special title pages: v. [2], Les amours de Ian Antoine de Baif. -- Paris, 1572; v. [3], Les ieux de Ian Antoine de Baif. -- Paris, 1573; v. [4], Les passetems de Ian Antoine de Baif. -- Paris, 1573.
Collation: v. [1], [16], 272, [2] leaves. a⁸ ã⁸ A-Kk⁸ Ll⁸⁺²; v. [2], [1], 232 leaves. [pi]¹ A-Ff⁸; v. [3], [4], 230 leaves. ã⁴A-Ff⁸; v. [4], [4], 126 leaves. ã⁴ A-Q⁸.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: t. 2, leaf 48 (F8) wanting. Binder: Bauzonnet-Trautz. Bookplate of Armand Bertin in vol. 2. Unidentified armorial bookplate (tree on crest, crowned) in vol. 1. Handwritten note, from the library of de Fresne. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 446.
